title: FS - An Excellent T206 B Team - 5/5/5

posts.post_title: FS - An Excellent T206 B Team - 5/5/5
posts.post_content:
PP f&f or check preferred method of payment.  Shipping included.


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10028/ball-cle[/IMG]

Neal Ball, the what's he holding, bird or ball, Cleveland card.  
Piedmont 350-460  SGC 5.5 (70)  sharp  $OLD  


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10026/barger[/IMG]

Cy Barger, played with Brooklyn in 1910 and 1911
Piedmont 350   SGC 5 (60)  $OLD


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/63615/bliss[/IMG]

Happiness is Bliss.  Jack will put a smile on your face.
Sweet Cap 350 NY  SGC 5 (60)   $160


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/18198/butler[/IMG]

Cy Barger's wingman at Rochester
Sweet Cap 350 NY  SGC 5 (60)   $220


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/23227/byrne[/IMG]

Bobby Byrne, mediocre utility infielder with 4 teams in 11 years
Piedmont 350   SGC 5 (60)   $175

Buy the card or the holder, not my description.:eek:;)

Frank,

I'll take Barger if still available.
Email sent.

Thanks

Ill take the Ball if still available .. the one with the ball!

Dfletch00
